title: Foodilic Kings Cross
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Western, Buffet, Fast food, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Serves a range of vegan salads, some of which are organic or raw. Uses mainly organic produce in all dishes. Offers cakes and desserts; vegans please inquire. Fair trade and organic teas and coffees available. Located just a short walk from Kings Cross and St Pancras International stations.
